data.subject: Bitter Sweet Symphony (Live at BBC Maida Vale)
data.lyric:
Cause it's a bitter sweet symphony this life
 Tryna make ends meet, you're a slave to the money then

data.subject: Rooting For You (Demo)
data.lyric:
Let winter break
 Let it burn 'til I see you again
 I will be here with you
 Just like I told you I

data.subject: May the Best (Church Mix)
data.lyric:
I really hate the way you called for me
 I hate the way your voice, it travels seas
 So take the gua

data.subject: Trials (Demo)
data.lyric:
Behind it all there's ordinary life
 And would you want me standing in the same light
 I wasn't wary

data.subject: Control
data.lyric:
And I guess that's control
 Forgetting your name
 And I guess that's control
 Is knowing your place

data.subject: Different Breeds
data.lyric:
There are so many different breeds, yeah
 I just need to find one that fits
 I know I don't show it

data.subject: What a Day
data.lyric:
What a day
 All the pain, what a life
 What a waste, what a lie
 
 You still shot me, makes me wonde

data.subject: Truth Is a Beautiful Thing
data.lyric:
Miles and miles on my own
 Warm with shame, I follow on
 A language to find hard to hear
 Not to und

data.subject: Leave the War With Me
data.lyric:
Fair game, go on and drop your head
 Feathers gone and make you lose mine
 Losing love all over agai

data.subject: Who Am I
data.lyric:
There is life in the dark
 So small but there you are
 Hand in hand, this life, you are
 Something I
